title.rendered: H.E. Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) had bilateral meeting with Joseph Borrell Fontelles, High Representative of the European Union for Foreign Affairs and Security Policy, on the sidelines of the 78th UNGA.

content.rendered:
On Thursday, 21st September, 2022, the Hon. Minister of Foreign Affairs, H.E. Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) had bilateral meeting with Joseph Borrell Fontelles, High Representative of the European Union for Foreign Affairs and Security Policy, on the sidelines of the 78th UNGA.
Discussions centered among others, on the security situation in the Sahel, with HMFA underscoring the need to review existing strategies on the region.
